item.title: A note about using 'fetch' in JS
item.description: Another story about fixing bug. This story is related to the native web API fetch, which is used to make request. Backstory After serveral days of having my first production application online, my client inform me that, the application has a bug, again. The button was not working as expected for one of the users.
